jathyanthara thaththwaye sewa sapayamin sewalabhin uparima thrupthimath bhawayata pathkaramin awama kalayakin nauka sewawan sapayamin shri lanka waraya adhikariya swakiya bhumiye watinakam manawin upayuktha karaganimin sahodara paryanthayange susanyogi dayakathwaya thulin pradhana naw sewa ha poshitha naw sewa kolambaa waraya wetha aakarshanaya kara ganimata nirantharayen katayuthu karamin sitiyi.
ohu ek ek dina jathyanthara tharagaya itu kara atha.
"ee ithin math ekka eka ande nidaganna anthima dawasa!"

elesa mati rupa bhawitha karanu labanne eewa pahasuwen nawatha sthanagatha kala haki bawini.
